data.what_is:
Aheadworks is a 4-time award-winning Magento Marketplace Innovator, provider of a full range of solutions for eCommerce projects. Since 2008, we have created more than 200 extensions (for both the Magento 1 and Magento 2 platforms), covering such areas as marketing, store administration, integration with external services, and B2B experience.
Check our bestsellers to bring your business to a new level: 
- Create checkout just in a few clicks to ensure exceptional user experience with our Smart One Step Checkout for Magento 2 
- Build the fast shopping experience with an advanced catalog filter system - Magento 2 Layered Navigation 
- Increase sales with flexible subscription options added to products - Recuring Payments Module  for Magento 2 
- Empower your shop with a selling blog with help of Magento 2 Blog extension 
- Sell more, increase efficiency and ensure business continuity with Magento 2 B2B Solution pack 
- Analyze, reflect and make decisions to raise the efficiency of your strategies with Magento 2 Advanced Reports
- Increase efficiency of promo campaigns suggesting free or discounted items at cart - Magento 2 Add Free Product to Cart extension
- Run efficient email marketing campaigns with Magento 2 Follow Up Email extension
- Comprehensive ticketing management for ultimate customer support with Magento 2 Help Desk extension
- Engage customers in an irresistible loyalty program - Magento 2 Loyalty Program extension
- Consolidate your cross-sells strategy and catapult sales with related products with Related Products Magento 2
data.product_description: aheadWorks is a certified Silver Magento Industry partner selling high-quality e-Commerce extensions and themes worldwide.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about aheadWorks?
Ok quality Magento modules. We use multiple of their Magento 2 extensions since 2016

What do you dislike about aheadWorks?
They promised us lifetime updates when we bought their extensions. In 2022 they stopped providing updates to existing customers.

What problems is aheadWorks solving and how is that benefiting you?
Improving the functionality of our Magento 2 store.

initial_reviews.review_title: I am completely satisfied with AheadWorks extensions!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task aheadWorks helped with:
My experience with AheadWorks started with Store Credit and Refund for Magento 2. I liked the idea of keeping money within a store while refunding. Not to allow customers to return products means losing their trust, but to allow means losing store revenue. So, the Support Team suggested to me this extension of converting refunds into credits. So money is kept in store and customers are provided with credits they can spend on other purchases.

What do you like best about aheadWorks?
Obviously it's easy-to-use functionality and an opportunity for automated refunds.

What do you dislike about aheadWorks?
I had some problems with installation but Support helped me with it.

Recommendations to others considering aheadWorks:
Credit system has increased our revenue and retained customers within the store. I continue working with other AheadWorks extensions because it's a provider I trust.

What problems is aheadWorks solving and how is that benefiting you?
I strongly recommend AheadWorks, because they really care about their clients and create necessary extensions for business.

Describe the project or task aheadWorks helped with:
We use the Blog for Magento 2 module for creating and sharing blogs about our business industry and products. Since our offering includes multiple categories and subcategories, the feature of Categories, Tags, and Related Products makes sorting easy and further creates a connection between products and blog artciles.

What do you like best about aheadWorks?
It works exactly like described and is very easy to install, simple to set up and use.  It includes all the essential features a blog plugin should offer, i.e., Category wise sorting, Tags, Related products, SEO, sharing buttons, and Disqus forums functionality.

What do you dislike about aheadWorks?
For a multi-store setup, you cant use the same blog with a different view for each.  We are Canada based business, and a few of our blogs are not entirely suited for the US market. So we are forced to create a separate blog for US customers instead of showing a  modified version under different store/view.

Recommendations to others considering aheadWorks:
Anyone looking for blog modules for Magento which are easy to install, set up, and use, Aheadworks is the right choice. This module offers everything necessary for an e-commerce blog. You can create a connection between products and blogs or vice versa.

What problems is aheadWorks solving and how is that benefiting you?
Creating a connection between our products and the industry. Also, educating customers about product features using this robust tool.
